评论概述: They need to change the fabric of the dresses.
评论详情: In the first two photos I am wearing the ones I purchased on Amazon they should fit more like my dress in the 3 Rd photo . But they don't because the dresses from Amazon have 4 % spandex in them which weighs the dress down and shows my flaws too much. If they made this dress with 100% polyester fabric the fit would be much better. I don't like to see my back rolls or lover handles and the dress with spandex shows all that I hate about myself . The 3 dress I purchased with stripes I bought from a site called daily deals . The makers of this dress should alter the way they are manufacturing this dress and only use 100% polyester in it . Also the spandex in the dress make it heavy in the chest area and that is why they have to add a stupid button to the dress . I don't like button but if you don't use the button the dress material falls down to easily and shows your bra or your nipple if you don't have a bra on under the dress. But if you notice my dress made of all polyester  doesn't need a snap. Bc it sits perfect over my breast area.  I'm trying to improve your design please make the change to $100 % polyester
This dress was super cute. I used it for my gender reveal party. The only thing I will say is the slit goes all the way up the dress so I had to wear shorts underneath.

Im 5’10” with a muscular/athletic build and this dress was able to accentuate my curves help me look a little daintier. It went all the way down to the floor so maybe watch out if you don’t have long legs or plan to wear flats.

I love these dresses! Super flattering, colorful, and comfortable. I will most likely get a 4th!  My Sizes For reference: -Between XL/2X, depending on the fit -Busty size 38DD -Normally 16/18 in dresses -5’4 / 189-195 lbs -Pants in between 14-16 depending on Brand

I absolutely love this dress, very flattering! So much so that I ordered 3 other ones. It’s great for warm weather with sandals & cooler days with a Jean jacket + wedges. Dress up for a date night or wear at the beach for casual day. Good weight and quality to it. Doesn’t hold wrinkles which is a plus too. LAUNDRY TIP: wash gentle cycle, cool water. Hang dry on a hanger folded over like a pair of pants to keep the straps from stretching.

Pretty dress.  As pictured.  Runs big.  I typically wear XL/XXL but decided to size down 1 size to a large based on the reviews and so happy I did b/c the large fits perfect!!  Not too tight, not too loose, just right.  For reference, I am 5'6 205 lbs.
Very inexpensive material. Ripped putting it on and all seems were fraying. Wish I could return but waited too long
This dress is nicer than I expected and it's long enough for my 5'11" height! I will be ordering more in different colors. I bought a size XL and I'm 5'11" tall and weigh 190.

评论概述: pretty dress, color is faded not like the picture and the large fit like an extra large.
评论详情: the dress is pretty, the color not vibrant as in the picture and it was too big for me.  am 5'4, 36c cup, 145lbs and usually wear large but this time I could not.  I order 2 dresses, the large for me and the medium for my sister for a separate event.  Both dresses arrived at the same time but My sister's arrived just in time, mine didn't so i had to buy another dress for my event.  neat less to say, I like the dress but had to return it because it did not arrive on time for my event and it fit me like an extra large.  I've had no issues with dresses before & i understand weather issues but, why change so much for it.

I love this dress and want it in every color! It is soooo comfortable and can be super casual or dressed up a bit if you need something to wear out. I was also incredibly happy that though I do have to hold it up to climb stairs or anything crazy, I don’t step on it when I walk and I am short!

Can see the nips directly in this dress. Is nice that it has a little snap clasp at the breast to close up the neck line if you want more coverage. But flimsy thin material. Very sheer and not great. Also wrinkles like a boss. Wouldn’t recommend.
Love it, super cute, casual but u can dress it up! Worth it!
I ended up returning it because it was very thin and see through. True to size.
Wasn't sure i was going to love this. Dressed it up with a belt and it was great. True to size

The price was well within my budget. Received unexpected compliments! Note that this is a dress that does not stretch but does not need to do so.
Very pretty just had to take it to to the cleaners to raise the slit.
Fits perfectly! Feels light and Autry! Absolutely beautiful!!

Bought a large for our trip to Cancun. Cool and breezy and sexy! I bought a large and it fit perfectly! Wore it for a photo shoot on the beach in Cancun and it looked great in pictures. Cheap material but doesn’t look it.

5’3” with 3” heels on and fit perfect. Size small. 137 pounds. I usually feel more comfortable in size mediums on most of Amazon stuff but definitely size down. Nice material and looks so beautiful when walking. Buy it!
Got lots of compliments on this dress. Really enjoyed the weight of the fabric
Weird kinda itchy material. Slit is weirdly placed.
CUTE DRESS GOOD LENGTH ,BUT HAS AN AWFUL SMELL LIKE FISH AND FOOD

Button broke off within seconds on first dress. 2nd dress did the same thing only I got to wear it one time so I couldn't return. Also the strap came completely unraveled. Very disappointing.

I love that the dress hides the back fat well. It does not droop anywhere.  There is a snap where most dresses have that peeking spot at the bust. It fits my 36DD very well. The girls were not stuffed. The straps are comfortable due to the polyester material. I did not care for the shiny all polyester material. I should have checked. I'm 4'11", but with my 2" wedge the dress is off the floor.

I want to buy multiples of this dress!! Extremely comfy! Stretchy, quality, fits perfect! Wish it was a little cheaper in price.

I bought this dress in a medium and a large because I wasn’t sure which one would work for me. I’m 5’9” 160-165 (depending on the day) with an athletic shape (broad shoulders, narrow hips). The medium fit perfectly, but was too short. The large was the perfect length, but was too big overall. Sadly, they’re going back. If they were cheaper, I would have kept the medium to wear as a beach coverup.

Bough this dress and wore it for my engagement pictures. The dress was very comfortable and light. Only thing I don’t like is the boob area, there is a snap but I did not like how it looked. Probably because the dress runs a little bit so I could have worn a S and the fit would have been bette. I’m 5 2 and about 170 pounds. If you normally wear a M I would suggesting getting both sizes to see which fits better.
This dress is very transparent!

I have bought this brand before and I had an idea of what the fabric was like so I didn’t think to check but it was a more cottony fabric so it didn’t breathe as much as the other dress I have but it was still super cute and flattering.
